translation.en: ♪ There once was a ma that wanted her… ♪
Rust Bank Brewery is the heart of this town.
No deal, Mr. and Mrs. Klaxon.
-[man on phone] Do you realize who I am? -We are not selling the brewery.
translation.ko: 내가 누군지 알아요? 양조장은 안 팝니다

translation.en: Not to you or anyone else.
I told him more beer, less prisons.
My library is set for the year.
-Before you put Mr. Fawzi out of business. -[Kat] Daddy!
translation.ko: - 파우지 씨 가게 망하기 전에 - 아빠!
안 돼, 더 먹으면 배 터져

translation.en: Delroy, honey, pull over. I don't like this.
translation.ko: 여보, 차 세워 날씨가 심상치 않아

translation.en: ♪ I'd like to get to know you… ♪
-Kat, you need to swim like we taught you. -[Kat] No!
translation.ko: - 캣, 가르쳐 준 대로 수영해야 해 - 싫어요

translation.en: -Mama! Aren't you coming? -Right behind you, baby!
translation.ko: - 엄마, 같이 안 가요? - 바로 따라갈게

translation.en: -You need to take a deep breath. -[Kat whimpers]
[teenage Kat] One scream, and my parents were gone.
translation.ko: 소리 한 번 질렀다가 부모님이 돌아가셨어

translation.en: Figured I'd just hate myself for the rest of my life.
They say everyone's got demons, right?
[demonic voice] Soul Jockeys! On the double!
Welcome to the scariest place in the Underworld.
translation.ko: 지하 세계에서 가장 무서운 곳에 온 걸 환영한다

translation.en: and this is the Scream Faire!
Okay, that's it! W-W-Wild, you're doin' it again!
translation.ko: 더는 못 참아 와일드, 또 이럴 거야?

translation.en: That's just a bad plug right there. That's what that is.
translation.ko: 이게 잘못 심어진 거야 왜 그랬어?

translation.en: -Why'd you plant it? -It's not a bad plug.
translation.ko: 이게 잘못 심어진 거야 왜 그랬어? 잘못 심은 게 아니지 네가 영양분을 훔쳐 먹고 있잖아

translation.en: You're depriving that plug of its rightful nutrients.
translation.ko: 잘못 심은 게 아니지 네가 영양분을 훔쳐 먹고 있잖아

translation.en: It's your fault Belzer put us in jail for treason!
translation.ko: 말해 줄까? 네 잘못이야 벨저는 반역죄로 우릴 감옥에 가뒀어
우리 가죽을 산 채로 벗길 거야

translation.en: I'm not worried, Wendell. You're the one shootin' blanks.
translation.ko: 난 걱정 안 해 쭉정이를 심은 건 형이잖아

translation.en: As your older brother, I demand you regurgitate that cream!
translation.ko: 형으로서 말하는데 그 크림, 당장 토해내

translation.en: Now, why would I do that? Wendell…
fresh cream ain't gonna revivify a bad plug.
translation.ko: 영양 크림으로도 죽은 머리는 못 살려

translation.en: Did you just admit you've been stealing it?
That's the dumbest thing I've… What? [choking]
[coughs] I'm gonna kill you! I'mma throttle you from here to next Tue--
translation.ko: 죽여 버린다 지금부터 목 졸라서 다음 주까지

translation.en: Oh, hey, you right! That does feel kinda good.
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞네, 이거 기분 좋아

translation.en: I'm having a-- a vision, Wild!
-[Belzer] And back to work! -[Wendell] Whoa! Uh, whoa!
[Kat] With my folks dead, the next five years were hell.
Yeah, I got into a little trouble.
I got a do-over at this fancy girls' school, RBC.
translation.ko: 두 번째 기회를 얻어 일류 여학교 RBC에 다니게 됐지

translation.en: ♪ I will come to your river ♪ ♪ I will come to your river ♪
The bridge. You had a panic attack.
It was at your parents' memorial.
You were already in the group home upstate.
translation.ko: 넌 이미 북부의 그룹 홈에 들어간 뒤였어

translation.en: You didn't need more bad news.
[Kat] Home definitely wasn't what it used to be.
Seems that brewery fire had a domino effect,
and the whole town had died.
But it wasn't just a do-over.
Something else up at that school was pulling me back.
translation.ko: 그 학교의 뭔가가 날 끌어당기고 있었던 거야

translation.en: Something that knew what I was
What sort of girls go here?
Prize poodles. All Best in Show.
translation.ko: 애견 대회 품평회 나가면 일등 할 애들이죠
다른 것도 챙겨 놨다 "K. K. 엘리엇"

translation.en: Rust Bank Catholic was the first school to sign up for "Break the Cycle."
translation.ko: 러스트뱅크 가톨릭은 재범 방지 프로그램에 참여하는 첫 학교야

translation.en: I bet my grandma's fry bread recipe on you.
translation.ko: 우리 할머니의 튀긴 빵 요리법을 걸었거든

translation.en: -"A slap and a kick for being so quick." -[Kat] What?
-Don't be shy, Katherine Koniqua Elliot. -It's Kat!
translation.ko: 수줍어하지 마 캐서린 코니콰 엘리엇 캣이거든?
우리가 다른 애칭을 이미 만들어 놨어

translation.en: It's your do-over, Kay-Kay. -And we're going to help you heal. -[snaps fingers]
translation.ko: 네겐 두 번째 기회야, 케이케이 우리가 회복을 도울게

translation.en: There's holistic goat yoga each noon.
Feed your soul, not your waistline.
translation.ko: 옆구리 살은 빼고 영혼의 살은 찌우는 거지

translation.en: Evenings, we meditate for the environment.
The earth resonates beneath our bums.
Who knows? "Prison Chic" could be the next big thing.
translation.ko: 누가 알겠어? 소년원 패션이 대세가 될지

translation.en: Now, let's get you moved in.
[Siobhan] Did you see what she did?

translation.ko: 이쪽이에요, 엘리엇 양 교장 선생님이 기다리십니다

translation.en: What's going on, Siobhan? How did she see it coming?
translation.ko: - 어떻게 된 거야, 시어번? - 어떻게 예상했지?

translation.en: But I have a feeling Kay-Kay's the best thing to happen here in a long time.
translation.ko: 케이케이는 정말 오랜만에 만난 최고의 사람인 거 같아

translation.en: -[cheerful French choral music playing] -[knocking at door]
Ah! Welcome home, Miss Elliot, to Rust Bank.
translation.ko: 고향 러스트뱅크에 돌아온 걸 환영해요, 엘리엇 양

translation.en: And welcome to RBC Girls! [chuckles nervously]
And now, you're gonna kick me out. Oh, no!
But you shoulda broke your back.
Uh, God willing, we're going to break the cycle.
translation.ko: 별일 없으면 우린 재범의 고리를 끊을 겁니다

translation.en: A second chance for girls like you. Yeah.
translation.ko: 엘리엇 양 같은 소녀에게 두 번째 기회를 주는 거죠 네, 맞아요

translation.en: This school's in trouble, isn't it? You need that "Break the Cycle" money.
translation.ko: 이 학교, 재정 문제가 있죠? 지원금 때문에 날 받은 거죠?

translation.en: Ah, and you… You need a fresh start.
translation.ko: 대신 엘리엇 양도 새 출발 기회를 받았잖아요

translation.en: I told them, bring this damaged child home.
translation.ko: 난 상처받은 아이를 고향에 데려오라고 했어요

translation.en: Surround her with the best and brightest, and Katherine Koniqua Elliot--
translation.ko: 똑똑하고 착한 애들 곁에 있으면 캐서린 코니콰 엘리엇도…

translation.en: Why were you up that tower?
It's an art project for when the snow melts.
translation.ko: 눈이 녹을 때 공개할 예술 작품을 만들고 있어

translation.en: Bad things happen to people I'm close to.
translation.ko: 나랑 가까운 사람에겐 나쁜 일이 생기거든

translation.en: Now, this spectacular creature is called Thaumoctopus mimicus,
It's the only creature that can change its body shape to fool predators and prey.
translation.ko: 포식자와 먹잇감을 속이기 위해 체형을 바꾸는 유일한 동물입니다

translation.en: Now, you look like an adaptable girl.
translation.ko: 저기, 적응 잘하는 학생이 하나 있네요

translation.en: Well, come on up, Kat. Get a close-up of this marvelous mollusk!
translation.ko: 캣, 나와서 이 놀라운 연체동물을 가까이서 보세요

translation.en: Ah, okay. You've never seen this before, right?
Uh, well, the mark proves that you're special, Kat.
But it has to be our secret.
-[nun] That's how I can protect you. -Protect me from what?
translation.ko: - 그래야 캣을 지킬 수 있어요 - 무엇으로부터요?

translation.en: That stupid octopus. It bit me, right?
-It wasn't the octopus. -You're just protecting your job!
translation.ko: - 문어가 아니었어요 - 자기 밥줄 지키려는 거면서

translation.en: So, what do we believe just happened? Sweetie?
translation.ko: 방금 무슨 일이 있었던 걸까? 스위티?

translation.en: No, she's clearly telekinetic. Her mind can move matter.
translation.ko: 아니, 염력이 확실해 생각만으로 물건을 움직이는 거야

translation.en: Well, I would posit that Kay-Kay is an interrupter.
A disturber of the status quo.
Oh, come on, Siobhan, leave her alone.
It's none of your business, Ramona.
Our faire is so much better than Belzer's dump!
translation.ko: 우리 놀이동산이 벨저의 쓰레기보다 훨씬 낫잖아

translation.en: But you couldn't keep your mouth shut.
I was braggin' to the wrong demon.
he called this an insurrection, a rebellion!
Now, we're stuck here for life!
Guess we got what we deserve.
"We"?! You have not begun to get what you deserve.
From the Land of the Living!
That's the girl in our vision!
[childlike voice] Yes. I've marked her hand so you'll know.
translation.ko: 그래, 너희가 찾기 쉽게 내가 손에 표시해 놨어

translation.en: It's a new day in your miserable lives.
translation.ko: 비참한 너희 삶에 새로운 날이 온 거야

translation.en: Imagine! She could summon us to the Land of the Living!
translation.ko: 상상해 봐, 걔는 우리를 산 자의 땅으로 소환할 수 있어

translation.en: But-- But demons aren't allowed up there. I mean, Belzer claims it's dangerous.
translation.ko: 하지만 악마는 거기 못 들어가 벨저가 위험하대

translation.en: Dangerous? Wild, he never even been there.
translation.ko: 위험하다고? 와일드 벨저는 거기 가 본 적도 없어

translation.en: Then that's where we'll build our faire!
That's amazing, Wild. You're right! He would never know.
translation.ko: 대단해, 와일드! 네 말이 맞아 거기라면 모를 거야

translation.en: -[laughs] Stick it to the man! -[Belzer snores, rumbles]
Shh! Not so loud. We're right under his nose!
translation.ko: 쉿! 조용히 해 여긴 벨저 코앞, 아니 콧속이라고

translation.en: So what do we do now?
Think it's time to see our Hell Maiden. Got any spare hair cream?
translation.ko: 우리의 헬 메이든을 만나러 가야지 헤어크림 남은 거 있어?

translation.en: Bloody council members in their tiny houses.
translation.ko: 코딱지만 한 집에 망할 의원들이 모였네

translation.en: They blocked our prison before, Lane…
and I'll blow beets if they block us again!

translation.ko: 잘 안 될 거 같아, 엄가드

translation.en: Can't bribe them, and they're-- they're too clever to be…
translation.ko: 뇌물도 안 통하고 아직 머리가 잘 돌아가니

translation.en: We have a new girl at RBC. [chuckles softly]
Sweet Siobhan told Mummy all about her.
Now the state's paying him to take in criminals.
translation.ko: 주 정부에서 학교에 돈을 주고 범죄자를 받아들이는군

translation.en: That's our business model, Bests. How dare you compete with Klax Korp!
translation.ko: 그건 우리 사업 모델이오 감히 클랙스 코프와 경쟁하다니!

translation.en: [laughs nervously] Well, technically, it's not competing if you have no prison.
translation.ko: 엄밀히 말하면 교도소가 없으니 경쟁이 아니죠

translation.en: We need our own council members to win the vote.
Oh, yes, uh, the old-guard members. They would vote for you!
translation.ko: 네, 의회 원년 멤버들은 그쪽에 투표할 거예요

translation.en: Ooh! Where do we find them, Father?
In the finest mausoleums in the cemetery.
translation.ko: 묘지에서 가장 좋은 자리를 차지한 무덤에 있죠

translation.en: We are no longer going to prop you and your precious RBC up.
translation.ko: 더는 당신과 당신의 소중한 학교를 후원하지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: Irmgard, Lane, I vouched for you the night of the brewery fire.
translation.ko: 엄가드, 레인! 양조장 화재 때 난 두 분을 옹호했습니다

translation.en: Really, Raúl, your art project, now?
translation.ko: 라울, 예술 프로젝트를 꼭 지금 해야겠니?

translation.en: It's the final part of the mural, Mami.
translation.ko: 벽화의 마지막 부분만 하면 돼요, 엄마

translation.en: What do you mean, "alleviate the situation?"
-[Irwin indistinct on phone] -But I am your top-earning paralegal.
translation.ko: 법무 보조원 중 제가 가장 뛰어나잖아요

translation.en: My success rate is higher than anyone on staff.
But you know that I'm fighting to keep my house, right?
translation.ko: 난 이 집을 지켜내야 해요 아시잖아요?

translation.en: What am I supposed to do now? I have a son to feed.
translation.ko: 이제 어떡해요? 먹여 살려야 할 아들도 있는데

translation.en: Look, Win, those workers were my friends,
translation.ko: 그 직원들은 내 친구였어요 "사업가, 사고로 사망"

translation.en: I-- I know the Klaxons are dangerous.
translation.ko: 클랙슨을 건드리는 게 위험하다는 건 알아요

translation.en: But if I can link them to the fire, we can stop the prison for good.
translation.ko: 하지만 화재의 범인인 것만 밝히면 교도소를 영원히 막을 수 있다고요

translation.en: -All I need is an eye wit-- -[Irwin indistinct on phone]
Oh, so that's it? We're done?
Don't you dare hang up on me! [sighs]
I really, really need to talk to you.
You need to swim like we taught you. All the way up.
Now, listen to me, baby. You need to take a deep breath.
translation.ko: 자, 엄마 말 잘 들어 숨 크게 들이마셔

translation.en: Who are you? What are you doing in my dream?
translation.ko: 당신들, 뭐야? 내 꿈에서 뭘 하는 거지?

translation.en: Uh… [clears throat] You-- You've got the mark, right?
What mark? I don't have a mark.

translation.ko: 너만의 악마지 - 뭐라고? - 넌 우릴 불러낼 수 있어

translation.en: Well, you can summon us to the Land of the Living.
translation.ko: - 뭐라고? - 넌 우릴 불러낼 수 있어

translation.en: -Why would I do that? -'Cause we'll give you whatever you want.
translation.ko: 내가 왜? - 원하는 건 뭐든 줄 테니까 - 흥

translation.en: Huh. Only thing I want is my parents.
-We can't raise the dead. -Well, we do know how to lie.
translation.ko: - 죽은 자를 살릴 순 없어 - 우린 거짓말 잘하잖아

translation.en: -No problemo! -That's right! You do your bit…
translation.ko: - 문제없어 - 맞아, 넌 네 몫만 하면 돼

translation.en: -Well, I mean-- -What do you got to lose?
Fine. So what do I do?
-Okay, now, first, find Bearz-a-bub. -[Kat] What's a Bearz-a-bub?
Finds Hell Maidens for demons. Found you for us.
translation.ko: 악마에게 헬 메이든을 찾아 주지 우리에게도 널 찾아 줬어

translation.en: -Well, it marked your hand so we'd know. -[Kat] Then what?
translation.ko: - 알아볼 수 있게 표시도 하고 - 그런 뒤엔?

translation.en: Then, you take it to the grave site next full moon.
translation.ko: 그런 뒤 다음 보름달이 뜰 때 묘지로 가져가

translation.en: -It'll tell you what to do. -[Wendell] Oh, yeah, one more thing!
translation.ko: - 어떻게 해야 할지 알려줄 거야 - 한 가지 더!

translation.en: Now, we'll both be in the dark.
translation.ko: 이제 우리 둘 다 어둠 속에 있겠군

translation.en: It's your Scream Faire Daddy! Say my name!
translation.ko: 비명 놀이동산 아빠가 왔다 내 이름을 말해!

translation.en: Jeez! Can-- Can you believe that vainglorious blowhard?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 자기 잘난 줄 아는 저런 허풍선이 말을 믿어?

translation.en: It's love him, can't leave him.
Danged souls have to praise him!
translation.ko: 지옥에 떨어진 자들은 놈을 찬양해야 해!

translation.en: At our faire, folks'll be lined up wantin' to get in!
translation.ko: 우리 놀이동산에 다들 들어오려고 줄을 서겠지

translation.en: Only, how are we gonna pay for it? I know how.
translation.ko: - 그 돈은 어떻게 대? - 방법이 있어

translation.en: [Wild] Remember that rich soul of the danged?
[Wild] Yeah. He said if we helped him escape, he'd--
[Wendell] That's nothing but a scam, Wild!
How 'bout I snap your horns off, rub 'em together, and make a fire?
translation.ko: 네 뿔을 자른 뒤 비벼서 불이라도 낼까?

translation.en: Stop the cart. Stop the cart!
Why you messin' with me, Wild? We got a serious problem to solve,
translation.ko: 왜 날 갖고 놀아? 해결해야 할 문제가 있는데

translation.en: and-- and you up here talkin'--
I bet folks would pay a lot to come back from the dead, right?
translation.ko: 다시 살아날 수 있다면 다들 분명 돈을 많이 내겠지?

translation.en: Yeah, sure, only that was just a tick.
translation.ko: 그래, 문제는 이건 진드기니까 됐다는 거야

translation.en: We need to test the cream on something bigger.
translation.ko: 더 큰 것에 크림을 시험해 봐야 해

translation.en: Uh, what if we can't bring him back to life?

translation.ko: 나 자신을 용납할 수 없을 거야

translation.en: Look, a full moon'll be rising soon!
Got our very own Hell Maiden to summon us up!
translation.ko: 우리 헬 메이든이 우릴 불러낼 거야!

translation.en: We'll dig up her parents and test the cream!
translation.ko: 걔 부모를 무덤에서 꺼내 크림을 시험해 보자고!

translation.en: There'll be plenty of dough to build our faire! [laughs]
translation.ko: 우리 놀이동산을 지을 돈이 충분히 생기겠지

translation.en: Kay-Kay, sometimes it's harder to let go when you've just met.
translation.ko: 케이케이, 안 지 얼마 안 된 이와 헤어지는 게 더 힘든 거 알아

translation.en: Maybe he was just trying to save the school.
Kay-Kay, it's customary to cast one's carnation on the lowering coffin.
translation.ko: 케이케이, 관을 내릴 때 카네이션을 던지는 게 관례야
난 케이케이도 아니고 이런 관례도 싫어

translation.en: I need a witness, and you're it.
[Kat grumbles] Why do those poodles keep bothering me?
translation.ko: 그 푸들 세 마리는 왜 자꾸 날 괴롭히지?

translation.en: [Raúl] They want you to be like them.
Wow, you were a poodle too.
I… I tried to be but…
Oh, gosh! Did I make a sculpture or a mirror? You know what I'm sayin'? [laughs]
translation.ko: 맙소사, 이게 조각이야, 거울이야? 무슨 말인지 알지?

translation.en: Oh. Nope. That's not gonna work.
I'm doin' somethin'-- I'm doin' somethin' important.
Come on, Hell Maiden, summon us up!
Ms. Hunter said it was bad.
My mother thinks the fire was on purpose.
translation.ko: 우리 엄마는 그 화재가 방화였다고 생각하셔

translation.en: Needs a witness to prove it.
You're, uh, gonna make a shrine?
Okay, now, tell me what to do.
translation.ko: 좋아, 이제 어떻게 할지 말해 봐

translation.en: [Bearz-a-bub] Hand me to the Hell Maiden.

translation.ko: 좋아, 이제 내 말을 따라 해

translation.en: Look, I made a deal. I'm bringing my parents back.
[Wendell] I've got the cream here. I'm gonna put this…
translation.ko: 크림은 실었고 이제 이걸 씌워야 해

translation.en: Flap it! Flap it! Flap it! Flap it!
-Flap it! Flap it! -[Wild] Here we go!
[Wild] Easy, Sparky, easy. Here we go…
translation.ko: 살살 가, 스파키 그렇지, 가는 거야

translation.en: [whispers] Go back to sleep, go back to sleep!
Say something! Tell me what to do! Please!
translation.ko: 말 좀 해! 어떻게 해야 할지 말해 제발!

translation.en: Why weren't you two on the bus?
-Uh, Kat needed me to be a witness? -It's my fault.
translation.ko: - 캣이 목격자가 되어 달래서요 - 내 잘못이에요

translation.en: Didn't want to see my parents' grave alone.
Well, we have a long, cold walk back.
translation.ko: 한참을 추위에 떨며 돌아가야 할 겁니다

translation.en: Eh, she'll show up at some point.
I say it's time to test the cream!
Ooh, that is one messed-up man of the cloth.
Sure, but if we can raise him up, we can raise up anyone in the cemetery.
translation.ko: 맞아, 이 사람을 살릴 수 있다면 묘지의 누구든 살릴 수 있겠지

translation.en: ["Sexy Thing" by Hot Chocolate playing] ♪ I believe in miracles ♪
-[Wendell] Who did it? -[Wild] We did it!
You're back in good ol' Rust Bank, fully alive!
translation.ko: 원래 살던 러스트뱅크에 살아 돌아온 거예요

translation.en: Thank you, Lord, for this miracle!
Not Him! We brought you back!
[Wendell] Don't worry, Padre. We are the Magician Morticians.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 말아요, 신부님 우리는 장의 마술사랍니다

translation.en: Now, as far as payment goes…
Um, uh, I have to pay you?
Yeah, we're gonna build the best bemusement park ever!
-We're gonna call it the Dream Faire! -Huh?
And you, and all your neighbors around here, gonna pay for it.
translation.ko: 신부님과 이 묘지에 묻힌 자들이 비용을 대는 거죠

translation.en: I-- I-- I need to show you something.
raise all the dead you want,
but there's no one here to pay for this faire.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 놀이동산에 돈을 댈 이는 없을 겁니다

translation.en: What's to stop us from puttin' your janky ass back in the ground?
translation.ko: 그러면 네놈을 다시 흙에 파묻지 않을 이유가 없지

translation.en: We need our own council members to win the vote.
Oh, yes, uh, the old-guard members.
Uh, uh, the Klaxons, uh, would gladly pay for your services.
translation.ko: 클랙슨 가족은 기꺼이 돈을 지불할 겁니다

translation.en: -Enough to build our Dream Faire? -With all the trimmings?
translation.ko: - 놀이동산을 지을 수 있을 만큼? - 부가 비용까지 다?

translation.en: Uh-huh. All that, and enough to save my school.
translation.ko: 다 짓고 우리 학교도 구제할 수 있는 돈이 될 겁니다

translation.en: [Sister Helley] Well, here we are, Kat.
Just tell me one thing before you go.
I know what you are, Kat. You're a Hell Maiden.
translation.ko: 난 캣이 누군지 알아요 헬 메이든이죠

translation.en: But how could you know that?
And you do not want certain parties finding out about you.
translation.ko: 그리고 캣은 특정 무리에 정체를 들키는 걸 꺼리고요

translation.en: Why do you care about me?
I care because I was just like you.
[Kat] Oh, so you were stupid too!
-You aren't stupid, Kat. -Stupid enough to get my parents killed!
translation.ko: - 캣은 바보가 아녜요 - 부모님을 죽게 한 바보죠

translation.en: Stupid enough to just watch 'em drown,
translation.ko: 물에 빠져 돌아가시는 걸 구조도 못 한 바보라고요

translation.en: not even try to help! Stupid enough to believe they could ever--
translation.ko: 물에 빠져 돌아가시는 걸 구조도 못 한 바보라고요 - 따라 나오실 거라고 믿은… - 그만

translation.en: Stop! It couldn't have all been your fault, Kat.
translation.ko: - 따라 나오실 거라고 믿은… - 그만 그게 다 캣의 잘못은 아녜요

translation.en: We were so worried, Kay-Kay, when you didn't get on the bus.
translation.ko: 네가 버스에 안 타서 걱정했어 케이케이

translation.en: -Where were you? -You gonna arrest me, Klax Korp?
translation.ko: - 어디 있었어? - 날 체포할 거야, 클랙스 코프?
체포? - 너희 집이 교도소 추진하지? - 맞아
- 너희 집이 교도소 추진하지? - 맞아 민영 교도소

translation.en: With trauma therapy, full detox, and whole-being cleanses.
translation.ko: 트라우마와 약물 중독 치료에 개화 프로그램을 갖춘

translation.en: You ever been inside a private prison?
Maybe it was just some students messing with you.
I said they were demons, Raúl!
My personal demons. And they lied!
Hmm. Maybe demons aren't the most trustworthy creatures to make a deal with.
translation.ko: 악마는 믿을 만한 존재가 아닐지도 몰라

translation.en: [Father Bests] It's your very own Father Bests.
Reports of my death were greatly exaggerated.
translation.ko: 제가 죽었다는 보도는 매우 과장된 겁니다

translation.en: -[chuckles] -What?! [Father Bests] So, I am back on the job,
guiding this glorious institution into the future.
-Everyone, okay. Please, stay calm! -[students squeal and shout]
-Just-- -It's got to be a miracle, right?
[growls] They were supposed to bring my parents back, not you!
translation.ko: 걔들이 살려내기로 한 건 우리 부모님이지 당신이 아녜요

translation.en: Forgive me, Father, but you wouldn't even be here without Kat.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 캣이 없었으면 신부님은 여기 없었을 거예요

translation.en: She's the one who summoned those demons--
Well, if you can't explain yourselves,
I have better things to do.

translation.ko: - 교장실에 인질 상황 발생 - 뭐라고요? 펭귄 출동!
우린 당신을 인질로 잡고 있는 게 아니야
둘은 지금 내 삶을 허비하고 있어요

translation.en: You were just 12 when we captured it.
just so you could add them to your stupid collection.
translation.ko: 그걸 이 바보 같은 수집품 목록에 추가했잖아요

translation.en: I made you my right foot of justice, and you quit on me!
translation.ko: 내 정의의 오른발로 선택했더니 곤란하게 네가 갑자기 그만뒀지

translation.en: It had nothing to do with justice!
There's a new Hell Maiden at RBC, isn't there?
My bear would've told me she'd arrived,
translation.ko: 내 곰이 있었다면 걔가 온 걸 말해 줬을 거고

translation.en: given me time to train and protect her.
But you stole it from me.
And the new Hell Maiden has stolen it from you.
translation.ko: 그다음엔 새 헬 메이든이 네게서 그걸 훔쳐 갔고

translation.en: [Sister Helley] Open the door. -It's an emergency! -Oh!
Now, where are Kat and Raúl?
It sounded just like him on the phone.
-You're supposed to be dead! -You look bloody hideous!
translation.ko: - 당신은 죽어 있어야 하는데 - 끔찍해 보여!

translation.en: Wait! I-I-I can get you the votes!
Now, they can raise the old-guard members you need.
translation.ko: 이제 두 분에게 필요한 의회 원년 멤버들도 살리면 돼요

translation.en: The ones rotting in the cemetery?
Sure! Have 'em all cleaned up, ready to vote by morning.
translation.ko: 그럼요, 씻긴 뒤 아침에 투표장으로 보내요

translation.en: Rich enough to build our Dream Faire?
translation.ko: 꿈 놀이동산을 만들 수 있을 정도로요?

translation.en: We'll pull the permits, fast-track construction--
RBC shall have our full financial support now!
Those brewery workers are in the same cemetery.
By the way, do you plan to raise anyone else from the dead?
translation.ko: 그나저나 죽은 자 중 또 살릴 사람 있어요?

translation.en: Well, uh, our Hell Maiden's parents--
No, no! No, no, no, no, no!
If you raise anyone else in the cemetery--
It's no funfair, no RBC money!
Just your voters will be raised. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 두 분께 표를 던질 사람만 살리겠습니다

translation.en: Exactly. All parked in a row.
Yeah, you weren't up in here. So, we-- we made Bests our guinea pig.
translation.ko: - 네가 안 왔잖아 - 그래 그래서 베스츠를 기니피그 삼아 실험했어

translation.en: That stuff'll bring my parents back? -Yep. -Um…
Klaxon said game over if we raise anyone else!
translation.ko: 클랙슨이 다른 사람을 살리면 끝이라고 했어

translation.en: -Ho-Ho-Ho-Hold on, now! Hold on. -[Wendell] Not just yet! See…
That-- That-- That's not how it works… anymore.
[clears throat] Hell Maiden, do you promise to serve us…
-You've gotta be kidding me. -[Raúl] Stop, Kat!
-[whirring] -Leave it, Raúl! -The heck is he doin' up there? -[fingers snap]
translation.ko: - 참견하지 마, 라울! - 저 위에서 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: Wasn't me, Wendell. Skull mouth did it.
translation.ko: 난 아무 짓 안 했어 해골 입이 한 거야

translation.en: Uh, for your first task… [whispers indistinctly]
I know! Get us some take-out. We're starving!
translation.ko: 음식 좀 포장해 오는 거야 배고파 죽겠어!

translation.en: [gasps] Only place left is… Fawzi's Falafel.
You and Sparky got graves to dig.
Warned you, Raúl, bad things happen to people I'm close to.
translation.ko: 경고했잖아, 라울 나랑 가까운 이들은 불행해져

translation.en: [Wild] Come on, we haven't got all night.
-[Wendell] Six. -♪ Wake up, dead man, work to do ♪
-Here we go! -♪ Will make our dreams reality ♪
-Whoa, that group was challenging! -Little dab to celebrate?
translation.ko: - 와, 진짜 힘들었어 - 축하의 의미로 한 입 할까?

translation.en: There won't be any left for Kat's parents!
[slurring] I love that little Hell Maiden, but…
translation.ko: 그 꼬마 헬 메이든이 마음에 들긴 하지만

translation.en: the Klaxons won't build our Dream Faire.
translation.ko: 클랙슨이 우리의 꿈 놀이동산을 못 짓게 할 거야

translation.en: I am so happy you're back, Kat!
Rust Bank needs some bright colors.
You want the hot sauce, right?
-And hey, don't be a stranger, hmm? -Thanks.
Uh, hey. You two need to head to town.
translation.ko: 저기, 두 분은 마을로 가셔야 해요

translation.en: Raised up our Hell Maiden's parents!
How many dead folks have they raised?
translation.ko: 죽은 사람을 몇 명이나 살린 거야?

translation.en: ♪ He's a germ-free adolescent ♪ ♪ Cleanliness is her obsession ♪
It's so wonderful to see you, Kat, but how is this possible?
translation.ko: 널 만나게 된 건 정말 기쁘지만 어떻게 이런 일이 가능하지?

translation.en: Hey! I still have the Cyclops, Dad.
translation.ko: 참, 저 아직 사이클로프스 갖고 있어요, 아빠

translation.en: That boom box could shake a room. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 그 플레이어 하나면 이 방을 흔들고 남지

translation.en: Was wondering where that went. Hmm.
[Delroy] I swear I told these people no deal.
Damn Klax Korp signs are everywhere!
translation.ko: 망할 클랙스 코프 간판이 어디나 걸려 있어요

translation.en: You're a lot tougher, aren't you?
You-- You didn't kill us, Kat.
translation.ko: 너 때문에 죽은 게 아니야, 캣

translation.en: Only reason you crashed is 'cause I screamed.
[sighs] Look, I made this deal with some demon brothers.
translation.ko: 저기, 악마 형제와 계약을 하나 맺었어요
악마? - 왜? - 두 분을 부활시킨다고 했거든요

translation.en: Because they promised to bring you back to life.
It wasn't demons. It was-- It was this kid, Raúl.
translation.ko: 우릴 되살린 건 악마가 아니라 라울이라는 애였어
- 그 애, 위험에 처했지? - 그럴 거예요

translation.en: If he's in danger, then we gotta go help him.
But I just got you back!
We do whatever we can for them.
[grumbles fiercely] Fine, fine! I'll take care of Raúl.
translation.ko: 좋아요 라울은 제가 도와줄 테니 두 분은 집에 계세요

translation.en: You two just stay in the house where I can find you again.
translation.ko: 라울은 제가 도와줄 테니 두 분은 집에 계세요

translation.en: [Wild] Oh, no, no, no, no, no! What are we gonna do, Wendell?
[Wendell] If the Klaxons find out, our faire is toast!
-[Wild] You gotta tell the Padre. -[Wendell] No, you have to tell him.
[Wild] You're older, Wendell. You have to do it.
translation.ko: 형이 나보다 나이가 많으니 형이 말해야지

translation.en: Pipe down, Spark Plug! Can't hear ourselves think!
translation.ko: 조용히 해, 스파크 플러그! 우리가 생각하는 소리가 안 들려!

translation.en: I smell somethin'. Our falafel dinner?
[Wild] Oh, and you ate little Raúl as well.
I'mma miss this cream when it's gone. Yeah, well, not as much as old Belzer.
translation.ko: - 이 크림이 없어지면 그리울 거야 - 벨저만큼은 아니지만

translation.en: So, you took my last two sons to the Land of the Living?
translation.ko: 그래, 마지막 남은 내 두 아들을 산 자의 땅에 데려다줬다고?

translation.en: See? That wasn't so hard, right?
Let go! My parents are waiting.
It was my fault they died.
I had to get them back. Let go of me!
Demons can't bring back the dead.
translation.ko: 악마는 죽은 사람을 되살릴 수 없어요

translation.en: Well, they had this magic hair cream.
Raúl, tell Kat's parents I'll need her for a while.
translation.ko: 라울, 캣은 내가 잠시 데려간다고 캣 부모님께 전해요

translation.en: [grumbles] Why should I do anything you tell me?
translation.ko: 왜 내가 시키는 대로 해야 하죠?

translation.en: Oh, have you missed me, evil thing?
-[screeching softly] -[Manberg] Wow. -She has sworn allegiance to her demons. -[Kat grunts]
-Well, only one thing to do… -[Kat straining]
Kat's demons are raising an army of the dead!
translation.ko: 캣의 악마가 죽은 자들을 대거 살리고 있어요

translation.en: Yes! And we'll need two Hell Maidens to stop them!
translation.ko: 네, 그자들을 막으려면 헬 메이든이 두 명은 필요하겠죠

translation.en: Now, open the Redemption Chamber, Manberg.
There's nothin' to be happy about anymore.
Don't need this kind of aggravation.
Some say Rust Bank is already lost, a ghost town.
translation.ko: 러스트뱅크를 이미 유령 마을로 보는 이도 있어요

translation.en: Because I know they caused the fire that killed our friends
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 화재를 일으켜 우리 친구들을 죽이고

translation.en: -You're preaching to the choir, honey. -Let's get to voting!
All here in favor of Klax Korp Prison, raise your right hand.
translation.ko: 클랙스 코프 교도소에 찬성하는 분 오른손을 드세요

translation.en: Uh, perdóname, but this is-- is council members only!
translation.ko: 실례지만 여긴 시 의원들만 들어올 수 있어요

translation.en: My Lord, Cassandra, it's the old-guard members!
translation.ko: 커샌드라, 저 사람들 의회 원년 멤버들이야

translation.en: In my professional opinion, these men are alive.
translation.ko: 제 전문적 소견으로는 이 사람들이 살아 있습니다

translation.en: Come on, Doc, you're just a foot guy.
It seems they do have a right to be here and the right to vote.
translation.ko: 여기 있을 권리가 있는 것 같네요 투표권도 있고요

translation.en: Mariana, have you lost your mind?
I have to, Fawzi. All living council members get to vote.
translation.ko: 어쩔 수 없어요, 파우지 살아 있는 의원이면 투표권 있어요

translation.en: [sadly] All those in favor of Klax Korp Prison, raise your right hand.
translation.ko: 클랙스 코프 교도소에 찬성하는 사람은 오른손을 드세요

translation.en: The yays have it, six to five.
Holy moly! Can that really be correct?
This'll keep you in wafers and wine.
Eh, my school and my partners thank you.
Ah, and bless you, my child.
Mummy, Daddy, I know the truth about your prisons.
translation.ko: 엄마, 아빠 전 그 교도소의 진실을 알아요

translation.en: Well, you make a pile of money for every prisoner you take.
translation.ko: 죄수 한 명당 나오는 지원금이 빵빵하죠

translation.en: So you pack them in like sardines, provide crap food, crap medical,
translation.ko: 그래서 정어리처럼 빽빽히 채워 형편없는 음식과 의료를 제공하고
갱생이 없는 끔찍한 환경에 가두려는 거예요

translation.en: I am proud of you, dear.
Don't some people deserve a second chance? Like Kay-Kay?
translation.ko: 두 번째 기회를 줘야죠 예를 들자면, 케이케이요

translation.en: Oh, we love those Break the Cycle kids.
translation.ko: 우리는 재범 방지 프로그램 애들을 좋아해

translation.en: Going to bus them in by the hundreds to your school.
translation.ko: 수백 명씩 너희 학교에 데려다줄 거야

translation.en: Then, we make it impossible for them to succeed there.
translation.ko: 그런 뒤 그 학교에서 잘 지내지 못하게 할 거다

translation.en: Our new prison will be waiting with open arms.
translation.ko: 새로운 교도소가 두 팔 벌려 환영하는 거지

translation.en: You're really going to do it, aren't you? Demolish Rust Bank?
The governor's coming, the press. Everybody will be there.
translation.ko: 주지사님에 기자들까지 모든 이가 올 거야

translation.en: -[laughs] -Promise you'll be there, Siobhan. All smiles?
Uh, I have to go now.
I-- I have to feed Gabby.
[sarcastically] Oh, I'll be there, Mummy. I promise.
Kat, your memories are what fuels the fever.
translation.ko: 캣, 기억 때문에 열이 나는 거예요
캣의 기억이 이 괴물을 만든 거예요

translation.en: Make it stop, Sister Helley, please!
Only you can do that, Kat.
Go on now, own your memories!
But you made me a survivor! [grunts]
I'm in control of my life now!
translation.ko: 이제 내 인생을 주도하는 건 나야

translation.en: We saved RBC and the faire!
Raisin' the dead didn't stop with the old guard.
translation.ko: 죽은 자 살리기가 의회 원년 멤버에서 멈추지 않았죠

translation.en: Him?! Oh, no, no, no, no, no!
-[Sparky grunts happily] -So what's the game plan, Padre?
I-- I can see the future.
-Helley's in trouble! Open up! -[banging on door]
-What's goin' on? -[Father Bests] Oh, no, oh, my!
[Kat] She passed out, cracked her head.
[Sister Helley] You don't get to smack me.
Good. You broke the fever, Helley.
[sighs] Thank you so much, Sister Helley!
It'll be unpredictable at first, but then--
translation.ko: 처음엔 예측할 수 없지만 시간이 지나면

translation.en: -[door opens] -Thank God, Kat! I've been looking all--
-Why are you here, Raúl? -Your parents, Kat.
translation.ko: - 왜 왔어, 라울? - 네 부모님 일이야, 캣

translation.en: They're gonna put them back in the ground. I just know it!
translation.ko: 다시 땅에 묻어버리려 해 그런 게 확실해!

translation.en: I'm going to kill Wendell and Wild!
With two Hell Maidens, we cannot fail!
translation.ko: 헬 메이든이 둘이면 절대 실패할 수 없어!

translation.en: Go ahead, Manberg. This Maiden needs a moment.

translation.ko: 좋아, 하지만 너무 오래는 안 돼

translation.en: -[punk music playing faintly] -Kay-Kay? It's me, Siobhan.
Fine. I-- I deserve the silent treatment.
translation.ko: 좋아, 날 무시해도 할 말은 없어

translation.en: -Bad goat, Gabby! Put that down! -[Gabby bleating]
Gabby, stop! Where are you going?
Huh. I thought you'd be taller.
Ah, yes. May the Lord look kindly on you
-All right, here it comes! -[parents] One, two…
-Kat was scarier when she was three. -[Wild whimpers]
It's, um-- [chuckles] N-No can do, Hell Maiden. You see…
Uh, you s-- What-- You still got 800 tasks to complete.
That is right. So, as your masters,
we order you to turn around and, uh…

translation.ko: 스파크 플러그 - 도와줘, 스파키 - 실망스럽네요, 신부님

translation.en: Uh, they-- they-- they were just my size, and I--
Not the boots, my parents! Why were you putting them in their graves?
translation.ko: 부츠 말고 우리 부모님! 왜 무덤에 넣으려 했어?

translation.en: P-Padre here said it was the only way.
And it was the only way to save my school. What?
[grumbles] Well, for starters, Sister Helley and I are Hell Maidens.
translation.ko: 이것부터 말해 두지 헬리 수녀님과 나는 헬 메이든이야 한 번만 더 케이케이라고 부르면…

translation.en: And if you call me Kay-Kay one more time--
translation.ko: 헬리 수녀님과 나는 헬 메이든이야 한 번만 더 케이케이라고 부르면…

translation.en: O-Of course, you are a Hell Maiden, Kat.
[sighs] Father Bests, my parents don't want to save your school.
translation.ko: 베스츠 신부님, 우리 부모님은 학교 살리는 데 관심 없어요

translation.en: It's how they pay all Klax Korp personnel. Worthless in the real world.
translation.ko: 직원들에게 지급하는 방식이죠 현실 세계에선 쓸모가 없어요

translation.en: I need to show you something.
You were right, Kat, about my parents.
translation.ko: 우리 부모님에 관한 네 말이 맞았어, 캣

translation.en: There's not gonna be a Rust Bank anymore!
I smell the blood of two thieving bums!
Oh, this is better than the undead army!
Everyone, down to the hearse, and don't draw attention!
translation.ko: 다들 영구차로 내려가요 시선 끌지 말고요

translation.en: I'm not going to hurt you.
There you are, my thieving mutts!
Come to the Land of the Living?
translation.ko: 아니면 산 자의 땅에 온 거?

translation.en: My Scream Faire did not need some radical new design!
translation.ko: 내 비명 놀이동산은 과감한 새 디자인이 필요 없었어

translation.en: What we all try to do.
There were others before you that ran away.
"Hell with them," I said. "They'll be back, tails between their legs."
translation.ko: 난 그랬지, '맘대로 해 결국 고생하고 돌아올 테니'

translation.en: Fine, Mr. Belzer. I, Manberg the Merciless,
translation.ko: 좋아, 벨저 양반 나, '무자비한 맨버그'는 악마와 철천지원수다

translation.en: am a sworn enemy of demons,
I have all your missing children.
translation.ko: 네 잃어버린 자식들은 다 나한테 있어

translation.en: Let my friends go, and they're yours.
translation.ko: 내 친구들을 풀어 줘 그러면 돌려주겠다

translation.en: uh, reports of my death were greatly exaggerated… [babbles]
translation.ko: 제 죽음에 대한 얘기는 과장된 것으로

translation.en: Dang, you raised him from the dead with hair cream?
Come on, boys, that stuff just don't last.
translation.ko: 아들들아, 그 헤어크림은 효능이 오래가지 않아

translation.en: Can't build a new faire without the designers.
translation.ko: 디자이너 없이는 새로운 놀이동산을 만들 수 없어

translation.en: -You mean us? -We'll make you proud, Pop!
"Stuff don't last"? What about my parents?!
No, a-a-all that's required is a-- a fresh dose of cream.
-Squeeze it right, be enough for days. -Weeks!
translation.ko: - 꼭꼭 짜서 써, 며칠은 갈 거야 - 아니, 몇 주

translation.en: Hmm. Now we have loved every single second with you, baby, but Rust Bank's in trouble.
translation.ko: 너랑 있는 매 순간이 소중했지만 러스트뱅크가 위험해

translation.en: What if that last bit of magic could help save our town?
translation.ko: 마지막 남은 이 크림으로 우리 마을을 구하려무나

translation.en: I already told you it's too late!
No, Kat, you can change that future.
translation.ko: 아니에요, 캣 그 미래는 바꿀 수 있어요

translation.en: My mother thinks the fire was on purpose.
translation.ko: 우리 엄마는 그 화재가 방화였다고 생각하셔

translation.en: Needs a witness to prove it.
Raúl, raise a dead brew worker.
If you squeeze it right, be enough for two.
translation.ko: 제대로 짜면 두 명분은 나올 거야

translation.en: Meanwhile, we're gonna protect Rust Bank 'til he gets back.
Everyone, ready to hold that line?
-Let's do this! -[all cheer] [Sister Helley] Oh, yeah!
[protestors chant] Down with Klax Korp! Down with Klax Korp!
Down with Klax Korp! Down with Klax Korp!
But Lane, Siobhan promised Mummy she'd come!
We have to start, Irmgard. Governor Bribes.
[protestors] No more Klax Korp! No more Klax Korp! -No more Klax Korp! -[clears throat]
Today, it's out with the old
and in with the newest, biggest construction project
translation.ko: 우리 주 역사상 가장 큰 규모의 건설 프로젝트를

translation.en: Now, my partners in crime, Lane and Irmgard Klaxon!
translation.ko: "사람은 수익이 아니다 교도소 반대" 이제 제 공범자들을 소개하죠 레인과 엄가드 클랙슨!

translation.en: -[protesters booing] -[laughs] Thank you. Thank you. No need, thank you.
When your governor offered us millions to build our prison here,
translation.ko: 주지사님이 교도소 건설에 수백만 달러를 지원하셨을 때

translation.en: we fell in love with Rust Bank.
A love sorely tested by that lot!
Should I do the honors, Irmgard?
-Don't mind if I do. -[megaphone feeds back]
Go! Go! Go! Crush them all!
♪ I know it's strange Another way to get to know you ♪
you're under arrest for arson and homicide.
Can't prove a bloody thing without witnesses!
translation.ko: 증인 없이는 하나도 입증 못 할걸?

translation.en: Wait, wait! It was all her doing!
-My wife's the murderer, not me! -How dare you, Lane?!
translation.ko: - 살인범은 아내지 내가 아니라고 - 감히, 레인!

translation.en: Good news, everyone! Klax Korp is finished!
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no.
Tell us about Rust Bank, Kat, in the future.
Hold tight, and close your eyes.
translation.ko: 제 손을 꼭 잡고 눈을 감으세요

translation.en: [Kat] Rust Bank's comin' back to life.
I'm doin' stuff with Sister Helley
translation.ko: 전 헬리 수녀님과 같이 일하고 있네요

translation.en: -How much do we love her, Delroy? -So, so, so much.
translation.ko: - 얘를 정말 사랑하지, 델로이? - 정말 많이

translation.en: You know, once our Dream Faire gets built…
It's gonna be about the best afterlife, upstairs or down.
translation.ko: 최고의 내세가 될 거야 천국에서든 지옥에서든

translation.en: Yeah, get them an all-inclusive VIP pass!
Well, now, hold on. J-J-Just-- Just check it out.
[Kat] I was supposed to hate myself for the rest of my life.
Mom, Dad, I… What do you think?
[Kat] But now, I don't have to.
I'm a Hell Maiden with amazing friends.
♪ Her ass is round ♪ ♪ Her breasts are sweet ♪
♪ She is sweet-tasting fruit ♪ ♪ Whose juice is bitter tears ♪
It's pretty late. It's 3:30 in the morning.
And I just woke up because I heard some noises next door,
translation.ko: 옆방에서 무슨 소리가 들려서 방금 깼답니다

translation.en: in the room next door, and you won't believe what-- what I found.
translation.ko: 옆방요, 제가 방금 뭘 발견한 줄 아세요?

translation.en: I'm going to open the door now.
Maybe she was getting bored at the studio, alone.
